name: TSG Technology Group
description: One Technology Partner is all you need. TSG is one of the UK's leading IT companies, trusted by thousands of businesses across a wide variety of industries. With 6 regional offices nationwide we can provide a professional local IT service covering IT infrastructure, business software, proactive support, telecoms, broadband, virtualisation, cloud computing, cabling and wireless systems.

locations.address: One Gosforth Parkway Gosforth Business Park
